home.text_base_description: Situated on one of the best streets in Eureka Valley this wonderful view home is a move-in ready delight and an incredible expansion opportunity. Enjoying easy Castro Village access and views, this comfortable home currently boasts 2 living levels but expansion potential within the envelope of the home. The foyer leads to a light filled main level with a living room, spacious formal dining room, functional kitchen and lovely breakfast room with downtown and Corona Heights views. Direct access to an outdoor deck and yard below. A 1/2 bath completes. Up the gracious staircase sits a highly desiable and rare floorplan of three bedrooms on one level. The rear bedroom is a perfect office space boasting incredible views. A full bath completes. Off the main level is a staircase connecting to a vast undeveloped level with high ceilings, access to the yard. There is also an additional lower level with expansion potential. Large yard and a possibility for 2 side by side parking.
